title: I‚Äôm about to save a lot of money!
text:
I have been playing this game for years. Spent more money than I ever should on a game ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è and now you take away the ability to exit before first move is taken. 
No thanks! I‚Äôm out! Some levels are extremely hard, and without the ability to exit to set a new board, people will be dropping like flies! Millions of games out there willing to keep people around with good bonuses, lives, etc. 
‚úåÔ∏è candy crush! It‚Äôs been fun, but now time to move on!

title: Was great. Not now after update
text: This game was great! Then they made these ridiculous changes that if you restart a game before making a move u lose your lives and whatever bonus you have. It‚Äôs crap

title: Update makes me stop playing
text: Everyone knows how to play and time tricks.  If you wanted it stopped, you‚Äôve done it too late.  Please reset the update or many, like me, will find another time relief game.

title: Bye
text: If they thought updating so you cannot go back without losing lives would boost their sales of specials then I wish them luck with that gamble. It was time to move on anyway...

title: So boring...
text: And so very confusing.

title: Reset removal fundamentally breaks game
text: There is no reason to play this game now that the reset feature has been removed. Just beat like 1500 levels in the past year but am stopping until this is fixed.

title: Review
text: Just recently began this again from a very long time ago.  It‚Äôs cute.  I‚Äôm not looking for a challenge.  Life is challenging enough!  I‚Äôm looking for some fun.

title: Nice
text: Candy crush it‚Äôs awesome but...... you might want to make the levels easier.

title: Fun to play and yet...
text: Fun and strategic game. Dislike the replay when you have already cleared a level.  Sometimes blips out and lives are lost.

title: I‚Äôm addicted
text: Love it! Very satisfying and fun

title: Update took away back out option
text: So now I lose a life for backing out of a game. That was the stupidest thing you could do. I‚Äôve had this game for over 5 years...many bad changes along the way but this is the one that did it, game deleted.

title: Bring back the option to exit w/o penalty
text: This is not a good update. I‚Äôm at level 4352 and the whole distracting fun is being able to pass it and level up. Please bring back option to exit w/o penalty. Until then I‚Äôll go back to my NYTimes Crosswords

title: See ya
text: Bye bye candy crush. Latest update is ridiculous and I will not play this game again until they change it back

title: The new update is terrible
text: That is it

title: Hate the latest upgrade
text: The game is fun, but there are too many screens you have to look at before you can actually get to the game. I am also really annoyed with the latest upgrade. The hints that appear IMMEDIATELY drive me nuts! There should be a way to turn them off. Why do the devs think we are all dying to have distracting suggested moves appear! Give us a minute to figure it out ourselves for a few seconds before you start offering hints.

title: New update stinks, they want your money
text: I agree with the latest reviewers. Taking away the ability to exit without losing a life has ruined it. I‚Äôm sure they just want you to get so frustrated with it that you‚Äôll want to buy more lives. You won‚Äôt get one penny from me. I‚Äôm done

title: Annoyed
text: Annoyed with the new update. Also I hate that the game chooses when it will ‚Äúallow‚Äù you to win. This is making it point less to play. Same with the booster wheel. It stops conveniently on what it wants to give you and never on the jackpot... very annoying the game chooses when it wants you to win.

title: No more reset no more gaming
text: App is deleted. I‚Äôm done with King and the money grabs. Should be able to give zero stars. F this company

title: Reset Update
text: The new update has wrecked the game for me!  Deleting now until it is changed back!

title: Update
text: New update makes you lose a life if you try to back out of a level before making a move...  not cool.  Please change back.

title: Bring it back!!
text:
I play candy crush for many years. It is the only game that I have so I really love it.
BUT, i wanna say something please bring that option that we could come back to the main menu before we start the first move.
Please bring it back I really need that option!

title: Took away game reset feature
text:
They took away game reset feature the other day. 

Now takes away the fun and forces you to use boosts when you don‚Äôt want to because of their placement. 

I‚Äôm done with the game until they restore the feature.

title: Not iPhoneX friendly
text: Been playing this game for years, now if I quit the game it costs a life.  Levels are hard enough, not getting a reset without expending a life is over the top ridiculous.  Deleting this as I‚Äôm not going to spend weeks to get through one level again.

title: Dumb update
text: Without the reset feature, I‚Äôm out. Game isn‚Äôt fun anymore. It makes it so the levels take way too long to pass, which causes a loss of  interest. Plus the booster wheel is rigged, I‚Äôve played for years and never won the jackpot. Just remove it if it‚Äôs impossible to get.

title: Took away ability to reset level
text:
Can no longer exit a level before your first move without losing a life and boosters. Being able to do that was strategic, not cheating.  

Quitting Candy Crush. How much greedier can King get? I am out.

title: Speed
text: I play other king games. The prompts on others are slow enough for me to consider next move. This game‚Äôs prompt is really fast. Too fast!  In fact I deleted it, reinstalled hoping starting over would be simpler and slower. Much to my chagrin not so. I‚Äôm not going to play very often as it‚Äôs frustrating‚Äîcertainly not relaxing. Very disappointed.

title: Rubbish Updates
text: The latest updates have been so rubbish. Would not recommend the app. The ‚Äúfixes‚Äù are just a way to make money in an unethical way.

title: New update ruined my game
text: I started playing candy crush since 2013, level 5876, without the reset feature its impossible to pass.. time to say goodbye.

title: Greedy change in programming
text: Recently King issued a release that changes a core part of the game. This is a shameless attempt to generate more in-app purchases. I no longer recommend this app.

title: It‚Äôs so good I can‚Äôt believe it if you want to get cand crush get it
text: Hi

title: The new update policy is trash
text: I do not like candy crush new updated policy. They now have the game set to where if you enter the level and exit out WITHOUT making a move they will take a life. With this new policy I will no longer purchase anymore items. However, I still love the game!

title: so long old friend
text: new update alienates long-time players. listen to your fan base King/Candy Crush or you will be obsolete faster than you can say ‚Äúthis update is garbage.‚Äù

title: New update and 2 minute ads, terrible!
text: The new update is terrible, can‚Äôt exit level without losing life.  And what is up with the 2 minute ads after EVERY life???  Use to be one ad after first life, for maybe 30-60 seconds, now it‚Äôs after every life for 2-3 minutes.  Very annoying and a giant waste of time.  For the length of the ads alone, I‚Äôm done with this game.

title: No reset move option
text: Can no longer reset your move...like the others before me said ‚Äúlose a life now when you reset your board‚Äù - this not cool to all of your loyal and faithful players. Not cool at all.

title: You lose a life if you didn‚Äôt make ONE move.....
text: Previously I could do this unlimited times but with the recent update.. when I try to press the exit button, it says you‚Äôre about to fail. Please revert back to the old way üò°üò°üò°

title: Reset Removal
text: Resetting ability is gone...and so am I. Ciao!

title: Can‚Äôt exit level without losing a life
text: I guess I‚Äôm finally done with this game. They took away the option to back out of a game without losing a life. This is needed especially when using boosters. Levels are already pretty impossible until the game decides it‚Äôs ready to let you win, and now this. Ugh!

title: Losing lives upon exit
text:
12/5/2015:

I don‚Äôt know what just happened, but as of today, when I start a level and try to exit (say a color bomb is marooned and I‚Äôm unable to play) I‚Äôm either forced to lose a life or I have to play on. I understand that this may not be something the designers love people to utilize, however, sometimes you HAVE to use this tactic. Can the app designers please fix this bug. This is absolutely going to deter players from playing, let alone purchasing anything from the candy shop. If it is a planned business move, I think this is a terrible decision. 

-Player since 2012.

title: Spin wheel, STILL no Jackpot!
text:
I‚Äôve been playing daily for years, (maybe missed 5 days a year) and have landed the wheel on every prize EXCEPT the Jackpot space.
     Bright side? There are so many other opportunities to gain boosters and lives on a regular.  Love my CC!

title: ZERO STARS
text: THE NEW UPDATE IS TRASH!

title: No more restart feature
text: After nearly two years,  6,000 levels and more $ than I‚Äôm willing to admit, I‚Äôm done with candy crush. Without the restart feature, the game will be impossible.

title: Horrible
text: After playing since 2013 they have taken away the option to reset levels just so they can get more money. I will no longer play or support the game

title: New update
text: Love this game but so unhappy that I can't exit the game without making a move and still lose a life?!!

title: Too many changes
text: I‚Äôve been playing candy crush since 2013.  This developer broke the last straw.  So when you select a level you use to be able to back out.  Not anymore.  You lose a life and if your on a winning streak you‚Äôll lose some of that as well.  Y‚Äôall greedy.  Greed is the root of all evil

text: Best fiends it is.

title: Ugh
text: Please remove long disgusting dog gum disease ad....

title: Exhilaratingly fun
text:
Update-12-5-19‚Äì just got the update and app won‚Äôt open. What‚Äôs up with this. 

Very happy with this game! Love this game! It is always exciting, challenging and fun! Every level is different and has two different games! It is free, plus have option to spend $! It can be addictive & helps you pass the time! One of my favorites! Try it! 
7/2018- They have lots of many really cool great contests and awesome variety of games that require different skills and steps to take! It‚Äôs so rewarding when you complete and accomplish each level and contest etc. Download  and give it a try! I bet you‚Äôll really love playing it!I'm glad I did!

title: Candy crush
text: Great game!

title: New update. Will likely delete for good.
text: The latest update takes away the abilty to back out of a level without losing a life if you do not make any moves. It allowed you to reset your boosters in strategic positions to give yourself the best chance of completing the level. This is now gone with this new update.  After years of playing and getting to level 3577, I will be deleting this game soon if this is not changed back. It is no longer fun and relaxing, it is frustrating knowing that it will take you a long time now to pass the harder levels.
